ingredients.ingredient: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

cookingTips: Combine soups for a creamy, rich sauce without lengthy cooking
Stir frequently to prevent sticking and ensure even heating
Serve over rice to absorb the flavorful sauce
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a simplified, quick etouffee using canned soups. Perfect for weeknight meals—the key is gentle simmering to warm crawfish through without toughening.
